meanings.sent1: I landed on my calcaneum when I jumped off the swing.
meanings.sent2: The doctor said I fractured my calcaneum when I fell down the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The calcaneum bone must be the strongest, as it supports all our weight.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the calcaneum of a building, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain in my calcaneum made it hard to walk.

meanings.definition: A bone in the human foot.
meanings.sent1: The calcaneum is crucial for balance when standing.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her calcaneum after running for miles.
meanings.sent3: The calcaneum bone is like the foundation of a house, keeping everything stable.
meanings.sent4: His calcaneum bone felt like it was made of steel, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The calcaneum bone connects the foot to the leg, allowing movement.
